body_html:
There are only two following possibilities

  1. You have used pip install or conda install of TensorFlow compiled for Cuda version 9.0 ; while you do not have that on your system.

  2. You have Cuda version 9.0 version but it is not added to the system path.

For the first possibility you have to install TensorFlow compiled for the Cuda version on your system.

For the second possibility you have to add CUDA to your system paths.

There are only two following possibilities


You have used pip install or  conda install of TensorFlow compiled for Cuda version 9.0 ; while you do not have that on your system.


You have Cuda version 9.0 version but it is not added to the system path.


For the first possibility you have to install TensorFlow compiled for the Cuda version on your system.
For the second possibility you have to add CUDA to your system paths.
body:
There are only two following possibilities 

1.  You have used `pip install` or ` conda install` of TensorFlow compiled for Cuda version 9.0 ; while you do not have that on your system. 

2. You have Cuda version 9.0 version but it is not added to the system path.

For the first possibility you have to install TensorFlow compiled for the Cuda version on your system.

For the second possibility you have to add CUDA to your system paths.
